snippet: Merrill Lynch is dangling a new incentive in front of its brokers by creating a "recognition club" for those who bring in $8 million or more a year from clients, more than doubling the top goals set by its securities industry rivals....

headline.print_headline: Merrill Sets New $8 Million Bragging Target for Its Top Brokers
headline.main: Merrill Sets New $8 Million Bragging Target for Its Top Brokers

lead_paragraph: Merrill Lynch is dangling a new incentive in front of its brokers by creating a "recognition club" for those who bring in $8 million or more a year from clients, more than doubling the top goals set by its securities industry rivals.
